title: All the Backlist: October 28, 2022
description:
This week Vanessa shares some horror picks for creepy reading season, and for once, she isn’t talking about witches.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or Stitcher and never miss a book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.

This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

BOOKS DISCUSSED
The Changeling by Victor LaValle
Five Midnights by Ann Dávila Cardinal
Category Five by Ann Dávila Cardinal
The Storyteller’s Death by Ann Dávila Cardinal
Our Shadows Have Claws edited by Amparo Ortiz and Yamile Saied Mendez
